sub_title: Behavioural scientist / Health care psychologist in training at Forensic treatment center Teylingereind
summary: A socially involved, driven and independent professional with strong interpersonal and communication skills. My strong suits include: self-reflection, time management and problem solving. I am adaptive with a strong sense of empathy, which enables me to quickly attune to any given context and environment. I exceed at being a team player and have the urge to learn from the knowledge, qualities and competences of those around me.

profile_positions.description: Providing information, support and services regarding mental health and wellbeing to young people. Being the primary professional on sight, my core activities were; supervising and coaching volunteers, helping with more severe, complex issues and intervening in crisis situations.
profile_positions.title: Professional/Staff member (secondment)

profile_positions.description:
My core responsibilities were; composing, implementing and coordinating end-to-end treatment trajectories, managing the crisis department; clinical and outreaching, psychological conversations and therapy sessions with clients, communicating with families and third parties (local government, police, child protection services), supervising and coaching teams of social workers, writing treatment plans, conducting intakes and participating in internal and external working groups.

As a behavioral scientist connected to Koraal, region of Maastricht, Heuvelland, Westelijke Mijnstreek. Treatment responsibility for the following products;
- Crisis treatment group Raadhuisstraat 15b, Gastenhof location Urmond.
- Very intensive clinical treatment group Raadhuisstraat 15, Gastenhof location Urmond.
- Outreaching crisis products Families First (FF) and Outreaching Crisis Intervention (ASH), region of Maastricht, Heuvelland, Westelijke Mijnstreek. 
- Intensive Home Treatment, region of Maastricht, Heuvelland, Westelijke Mijnstreek.  

Structural working groups
* April 2018 - May 2018; Provincial working group custodial youth care.
* October 2017 - February 2018; Task force financial fundament treatment and residence (Koraal internal).
* October 2016 - November 2018; Mental health network consultation group, region of South-Limburg.
* February 2018 -November 2018; Task force crisis residential South-Limburg.
